name: Albert Einstein
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of feminists.

name: Alexandra Kollontai
description: Russian revolutionary, diplomat, and Bolshevik government official. The most prominent woman in the Soviet administration. Developed Marxist feminism and argued for sexual and reproductive freedom.

works.title: The Autobiography of a Sexually Emancipated Communist Woman
